Title: Includes image-guided biopsies under certain insurance coverage for breast cancer screening and provides for mandatory health insurance coverage for lung cancer screening
Summary: Includes image-guided biopsies under mandatory insurance coverage for breast cancer screening; provides for mandatory health insurance coverage for lung cancer screening; requires that health insurance policies shall provide coverage for lung cancer screening or follow-up diagnostic imaging to assist in the diagnosis of lung cancer; provides that no copayment, coinsurance, or deductible requirement shall be imposed for follow-up screening or diagnostic services for lung cancer screening or follow-up diagnostic imaging and prior authorization for such coverage shall not be required.
